explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes an end-to-end graph neural network framework for account de-anonymization, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.deep learning: The framework uses a hierarchical graph attention encoder (HGATE), which is a deep learning technique.
explanations.neural network: The proposed framework is based on graph neural networks, a type of neural network.
explanations.representation learning: The framework characterizes node-level account features and subgraph-level behavior patterns, which involves learning representations of the data.
explanations.attention mechanism: The hierarchical graph attention encoder (HGATE) uses attention mechanisms to process the graph data.
explanations.classification: The paper considers identifying Ethereum accounts from a graph classification perspective.
